attributes.action: Take steps to ensure that all those politicians who received non job related free olympic tickets pay tax on them.
attributes.additional_details: Free tickets to watch the Olympic Games is a non-job related benefit in kind for which EVERYBODY who is NOT an MP would have to declare for income tax purposes.  If we are 'ALL IN THIS TOGETHER' then Mr Cameron needs to make sure everybody in the HofC who received these free tickets makes a declaration to the taxman so that tax may be paid.  Again, THIS IS A NON JOB RELATED BENEFIT IN KIND UPON WHICH EVERYBODY WHO IS NOT AN MP WOULD LEGALLY HAVE TO DECLARE FOR INCOME TAX PURPOSES.
